footerSections.sectionText:
Modern web application made for the community (for us!), by the community, to collect most relevant information about development technologies.

With community rating, you will get only the best content existing in the open web.

Project is fully open source, you can contribute links to best articles, ideas and improve web application source code simply by leaving your pull requests.

DevShelf is all about storing best articles and tools, not your documentation. For documentation purposes, use devdocs.io.

search-output.voteDisabled: Голосование в данный момент не доступно, мы уже работаем над решением

description.p: After two extremely challenging days during the Hackaton (plus few commits afterwards), we are happy to introduce our latest project — DevShelf.us. This is modern, cutting-edge web application, which collects only the best and most rated articles about HTML5 stack of technologies.

We provide search engine intelligence and base for your contributed data inside our application, to present you only best and relevant information about those new technologies, which you are looking for.
Project has been developed and now is supported by OK.ru front-end development team (creators of Source and MCSS), but as we are fully open source, everybody can join us and make web a better place.

theTeam.name: Juris Pukitis
theTeam.role: Node JS back-end supplier, data caching.
